amendment.description: Amendment sought to amend the definition of greenhouse gas, to remove water vapor as a part of the definition, strike the removal of existing EPA findings and rules, and exempt all auto standards from the legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-54 to amend the definition of greenhouse gas, to remove water vapor as a part of the definition, amend the act by striking the removal of existing EPA findings and rules, and exempt all auto standards from the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Cuellar.
